name: keptn-integration
description: Integration of Keptn within your build.

scripts.test-all: npm run test-prep && npm run test-send && npm run test-wait && npm run test-addr
scripts.install-all: cd PrepareKeptnEnvTask && npm install && cd ../SendKeptnEventTask && npm install && cd ../WaitForKeptnEventTask && npm install && cd ../AddKeptnResourceTask && npm install && cd ..
scripts.cbt: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test-all

author: Dynatrace
